DOC.HEADLINE: OFF THE TICKER : AND THE WINNER IS . . . ( ENTER )
DOC.TEXT: Not a voting member of the motion_picture academy ? No need to feel left_out . ABC Television and NTN Communications Inc. will broadcast a live interactive version of the Academy Awards ceremony Monday night , allowing viewers to vote on the Oscar nominees in all major categories . The company said the interactive awards show will be seen by television viewers throughout the United States and Canada at the 1 # 500 sites -- mostly bars and hotel lounges -- that subscribe_to NTN ' s entertainment network . Using a hand-held cordless keyboard , participants will predict the winners . Those correctly predicting the most winners will win prizes , among them a year ' s supply of movie passes . AMY HARMON
